Package org.simplity.gateway

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cacher  
    OutboundAgent
    Service agent to get response for an external service that a simplity service wants as part of its execution step.
    ReqReader
    translate data from data source to service context based on InputDataSpecification, or create output data from service context based on OutputData specification
    RespWriter  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Gateway
    static class to manage all aspects of a gateway
    JsonObjectRespWriter
    prepares a dynamic JSON Object based on the write commands received.
    JsonReqReader
    request reader for json input
    JsonRespWriter
    prepares a JSON response based on output specifications.
    ProtoInboundAgent
    internal servlet that handles all requests coming in as open-api.
    ProtoReqReader
    request reader for json input
    ProtoRespWriter
    protobuf based writer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ReqReader.InputValueType
    type of value received as input
Author:
simplity.org
